name: IMMZ.DT.09.Rubella
description: If child or patient has not received the Rubella vaccination and is greater than or equal to 9 months

action.title: Immunize Patient for Rubella- No Doses
action.description: Provide Rubella immunizations – using the "Rubella Vaccine immunization – NO PREVIOUS" schedule (1 dose scheme)

expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient for Rubella because no doses on 1 dose scheme
